issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.description: After TEZ-3550, we should be able to log Tez DAG ID early to have queryId-dagId mapping when debugging
fields.summary: log Tez DAG ID in places

comments.body: Cannot be committed until the Tez upgrade

+1. Considering the DAGClientSync in the hive codebase - maybe this can be committed.
Anyway, we probably need an umbrella tracking everything waiting on a 0.9 tez release.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12856361/HIVE-16129.patch
